Class CargosManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsoftware.ll13.model.ship_board.ship_components.CargosManager
public class CargosManager extends Object
This class is part of the ship class, and its used to manage the cargos. contains methods to add, remove and count the number of cargos on the ship, and points that those add to the total of a player

    • removeBestCargo

      public int removeBestCargo(ShipLayout shipLayout, int cargoNumber)
      This is a method that removes the number specified of best cargos present in the ship.
      Parameters:
      shipLayout - the layout of the ship.
      cargoNumber - the number of cargo that needs to be eliminated.
      Returns:
      an integer representing the number of cargo that still needs to be eliminated.

    • removeBestCargo

      public boolean removeBestCargo(ShipLayout shipLayout)
      This is a method that removes the best cargo present in the ship.
      Parameters:
      shipLayout - the layout of the ship.
      Returns:
      if the cargo was correctly removed.
